column4: my gnome-panels keep failing and locking up ... i can't figure out which applet is crashing them but i have almost no usuability in gnome without the panels ... is there anything i can do ?
gasten no i haven't
the only thing that is different is i have deskbar-applet on the panel but it was running fine last time the panels were working
i have 3 panels and i can't use any of them
plus i don't know how to remove things from the panel without having access to the panel so they all just keep getting reloaded
i just dont know what would be fudging up the panels
can i just remove the session file ?
make a backup first, and try
good idea
and not using edgy or glx ?
no glx
have you installed applets outside ubuntu.com repos ? or even debs with dpkg ? or even self compiled ?
no ... the only app i added lately was NM and deskbar-applet
then maybe uninstalling the applets you last install... sorry, i dont know where to debug that...
its okay ... it sounds like a good idea, i will give it a shot
how exactly did you burn the image ? did you read this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto
.... after hours it was the deskbar applet apparently
hmm, hope it aint a bug...
i hope not aswell .. i like deskbar applet ... it is much better than katapult
from which repo did you install it ?
continue to use dapper repo ? what does that mean ?
not what i ment... could you pastebin your sources.list file ?
... #flood
ok
